Squads:

Australia: Steve Smith (captain), Sean Abbott, Alex Carey, Ben Dwarshuis, Nathan Ellis, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Aaron Hardie, Travis Head, Josh Inglis, Spencer Johnson, Marnus Labuschagne, Glenn Maxwell, Tanveer Sangha, Matthew Short, Adam Zampa.

(captain), Sean Abbott, Alex Carey, Ben Dwarshuis, Nathan Ellis, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Aaron Hardie, Travis Head, Josh Inglis, Spencer Johnson, Marnus Labuschagne, Glenn Maxwell, Tanveer Sangha, Matthew Short, Adam Zampa. Afghanistan: Hashmatullah Shahidi (captain), Ibrahim Zadran, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Sediqullah Atal, Rahmat Shah, Ikram Alikhil, Gulbadin Naib, Azmatullah Omarzai, Mohammad Nabi, Rashid Khan, Nangyal Kharoti, Noor Ahmad, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Farid Malik, Naveed Zadran. Reserves: Darwish Rasooli, Bilal Sami.

After a dramatic eight-run victory against England, Afghanistan captain Hashmatullah Shahidi has set his sights on defeating Australia to secure a semi-final spot at the ongoing ICC Champions Trophy The tournament newcomers, who previously defeated England at the 2023 World Cup in India, continued their impressive form by eliminating the English side from the 50-over competition on Wednesday.Afghanistan's crucial match against world champions Australia is scheduled for Friday at Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore.A victory is essential for Afghanistan to advance to the semi-finals of this eight-nation tournament. Afghanistan remain in contention for the semi-finals even with a washout, though their progression would then depend on other match outcomes or net run-rate calculations.Australia, who defeated England by five wickets in their opening fixture, experienced a complete washout in their match against South Africa. Another cancelled match would automatically qualify Australia for the next round.In their previous four ODI encounters, Australia have maintained a perfect record against Afghanistan, who have emerged as a formidable team in limited-overs cricket.Afghanistan's recent success includes defeating Australia in the previous year's T20 World Cup, where they achieved a historic semi-final appearance.The weather forecast for Lahore for Friday is a couple of soaking showers in the morning, followed by cool weather with variable cloudiness for the entire day. Temperature is likely to hover below 20s degrees Celsius.Afghanistan vs Australia in the Champions Trophy 2025 will take place at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore.The Champions Trophy 2025 match between Pakistan and Bangladesh will start at 2:30pm IST. The toss will take place at 2pm IST.The Champions Trophy 2025 match between Pakistan and Bangladesh will be on TV on the Star Sports and Sports18 TV channels in India.The Champions Trophy 2025 match between Pakistan and Bangladesh will be live streamed on the JioHotstar app and website in India.
Article Summary: Afghanistan face world champions australia in champions trophy 2025. The match is scheduled for friday at the gaddafi stadium, lahore. A victory is essential for afghanistan to advance to the semi-finals of this eight-nation tournament. Australia defeated england by five wickets in their opening fixture.

Article Title: Dallas Mavericks' Anthony Davis' Fate Undecided?: Jason Kidd's Update on Adductor Strain
Article Text:
Credits: Getty Images

AD's Adductor Agony: Will the Mavs' Gamble Pay Off?

In the swirling vortex of NBA trades and superstar shakeups, the Dallas Mavericks threw a cosmic curveball, swapping Luka "Magic" Doncic for the enigmatic Anthony Davis . Now, just weeks into this bold experiment, the basketball gods seem to be testing Dallas's resolve. AD, the man meant to propel them to championship contention, is sidelined, leaving fans clutching their popcorn and wondering: did they just trade a symphony for a silent film?The villain in this particular drama? An adductor strain. Think of it as a pulled groin but with a more technical, doctor-y name. The adductors are a group of muscles in your inner thigh, crucial for bringing your legs together. For a basketball player, they're essential for lateral movement, explosive drives, and, well, not collapsing in a heap during your debut game. Davis, unfortunately, experienced this exact scenario, dominating the Houston Rockets before a sudden, agonizing exit.Since then, the Mavs have been navigating a choppy sea, going 3-3, a record as lukewarm as a day-old latte. The latest chapter, a clash against their former golden boy, Luka Doncic , and the Lakers , ended in a 107-99 defeat, a stark reminder of what they traded away. But amidst the gloom, a glimmer of hope: Jason Kidd , the Mavs' stoic coach, offered a cautiously optimistic update on Davis's recovery."He feels good, but just in conversation he says he feels great," Kidd revealed, a phrase that could either mean Davis is ready to leap tall buildings or just really enjoyed his post-workout smoothie. Kidd further added that Davis is engaging in light shooting and weight-lifting, which are signs of a player slowly but surely returning to form. The positive vibes are flowing, with Kidd noting AD's upbeat spirit.ALSO READ: Why Kevin Durant Said NO: The Real Reason He Killed Potential Golden State Warriors Trade The Mavericks' "win-now" mantra hangs heavy in the air. This trade wasn't a long-term project, it was a desperate gamble, a high-stakes poker hand played with the team's future. The pressure is on Davis to return and justify the seismic shift. Until then, Dallas fans are left to wonder if their grand experiment will become a masterpiece or a cautionary tale, all while hoping AD's adductor strain heals faster than a plot twist in a soap opera.
Article Summary: Dallas mavericks traded luka "magic" doncic for anthony davis. Davis suffered an adductor strain in his debut game against the houston rockets. The mavs have gone 3-3, a record as lukewarm as a day-old latte. The pressure is on davis to return and justify the seismic shift.

Article Title: Why Kevin Durant Said NO: The Real Reason He Killed Potential Golden State Warriors Trade
Article Text:
Credits: Getty Images

The Trade That Never Was: Kevin Durant's Relatable Choice That Changed the Golden State Warriors' Fate

Kevin Durant on Warriors-Suns trade veto, Steph Curry & BEST NBA era | Draymond Green & Baron Davis

Kevin Durant , the NBA's resident enigma wrapped in a 7-foot frame, recently dropped a truth bomb that sent ripples through the basketball universe. Forget cryptic tweets and vague Instagram stories; he went straight to the source, The Draymond Green Show , to explain why a potential Golden State Warriors reunion was a hard "no." It wasn't about burning bridges or holding grudges, it was about something far more relatable: the sheer, soul-crushing exhaustion of mid-season upheaval.Durant's dedication to the Phoenix Suns was indeed a factor, but the core of his decision was rooted in the simple, human desire for stability. "I didn't want to move," he declared, echoing the sentiments of anyone who's ever dreaded packing boxes. He'd been through the whirlwind of team changes before, and the prospect of another mid-season shakeup, especially with the trade deadline looming, was simply too much. "It’s just such a big change, and I’ve been through it before," he explained, painting a picture of a player weary of constant transitions.Think of it like this: imagine moving apartments, not just once, but multiple times, always in the middle of a work project. The stress of packing, unpacking, and adjusting to a new environment while trying to perform at peak levels is immense. Durant, a player who costs "a lot," recognized the disruptive impact a mid-season trade would have on any team. "Me just getting up and moving in the middle of the season, it’s going to be a big blow to any team I’m going to," he stated, highlighting the logistical and emotional toll of such a move.Beyond the personal disruption, Durant also expressed a commitment to the Suns' journey. He wanted to see what the team could achieve, especially after the departure of key players like Cam Johnson and Mikal Bridges . "I’m trying to see this through to the end and see what we can really do with it," he emphasized, underscoring his loyalty to his coaches and teammates. He wanted to give the Phoenix experiment a fair shot, to see if they could forge something special together.ALSO READ: Why Did Los Angeles Lakers Tribute Video Hit Anthony Davis So Hard? His Reaction Says It All Adding a touch of nostalgia, Durant reflected on his time playing with NBA legends LeBron James and Stephen Curry . He spoke of a unique connection with Curry, a silent understanding honed through years of shared experience. "I felt like I was the only one on the court who knew what he was thinking," he recalled, referencing their time together during the 2024 Summer Olympics. This glimpse into their unspoken chemistry highlighted the deep bonds formed in the crucible of elite competition, reminding us that even in the high-stakes world of professional sports, human connections remain paramount.
Article Summary: Kevin durant vetoed a trade to the phoenix suns. He said he didn't want to move in the middle of the season. Durant said he wanted to give the suns a fair shot. He also reflected on his time playing with stephen curry and lebron james.

Article Title: NBA Offseason Rumors: Golden State Warriors might bag $186 million Milwaukee Bucks superstar to form Big 3 with Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler
Article Text:
Golden State Warriors forward Jimmy Butler, left, and guard Stephen Curry, right, warm up before an NBA basketball game against the Chicago Bulls, Saturday, Feb. 8, 2025, in Chicago. (Image via AP Photo/Erin Hooley)

Golden State Warriors

"Antetokounmpo has fascinated this franchise for years, and he might have reasons to look around if Milwaukee, which has one series win to show for the past three seasons, can't reverse its playoff misfortunes,"

Giannis posing for the camera (Image via Getty).

Thehave been prominent in the NBA this season, and their recent acquisition of Jimmy Butler has significantly boosted their playoff prospects. After hovering around the Play-In Tournament zone earlier in the season, the Warriors now look poised to secure a solid playoff berth. But if they fall short this year, a blockbuster move could be on the horizon to elevate them back into championship contention.According to Bleacher Report, the Golden State Warriors are predicted to pursue Milwaukee Bucks superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo in the offseason. The two-time MVP, who is currently averaging 31 points, 12 rebounds, and 5.8 assists on 60.9% shooting, could be the missing piece to complete a new Big Three alongside Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler .wrote B/R's Zach Buckley. The Bucks' recent playoff struggles could make Giannis open to exploring new opportunities, and the vWarriors' dynamic system might be the perfect fit for his skill set.Golden State's emphasis on ball movement and three-point shooting would create endless opportunities for Giannis Antetokounmpo to dominate. With Curry's unparalleled shooting range and Butler's two-way versatility, the Warriors could space the floor like never before, giving Giannis ample room to attack the rim and wreak havoc on opposing defenses.However, pulling off such a trade won’t be easy. The Golden State Warriors would likely need to include Draymond Green’s salary in any deal to match Giannis Antetokounmpo’s $175 million contract. While it’s a steep price, the potential payoff could be enormous. Adding Giannis to the roster would instantly make the Warriors the team to beat next season, positioning them as overwhelming title favorites.As the season progresses, all eyes will be on the Warriors and their pursuit of another championship. Whether they make a deep playoff run this year or pivot to a blockbuster trade in the offseason, Golden State is determined to remain a dominant force in the NBA.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might want to sign $22 million 2x NBA Champion to bolster their championship run Let us know in the comments down below if you feel Giannis Antetokounmpo is a fitting pick for the boys in Golden and Purple. Also, do not forget to follow us on TOI NBA for the latest updates on everything taking place in the world of basketball.
Article Summary: The golden state warriors are predicted to pursue milwaukee bucks superstar giannis antetokounmpo in the offseason. The bucks' recent playoff struggles could make giannis open to exploring new opportunities, and the vwarriors' dynamic system might be the perfect fit for his skill set.

Article Title: Did the Super Bowl loss strain Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s relationship? The couple enters ‘darker period’ of their love story
Article Text:
Image via GC

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are still going strong in their relationship



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are still going strong in their relationship, holding hands through tough times. Following the Kansas City Chiefs' devastating Super Bowl LIX defeat to the Philadelphia Eagles, Kelce has taken solace in Swift's songs. Addressing persistent rumors of his future in the NFL and his relationship, he posted on his New Heights podcast that her songs speak so deeply to him, evoking a broad spectrum of emotions-even the agony of losing such a high-stakes game.Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce continue to stand by each other through every challenge. Following the Kansas City Chiefs' tough Super Bowl LIX loss to the Philadelphia Eagles, Kelce has been leaning on Swift for support. Amid speculation about his potential retirement and the future of their relationship, he opened up about how her music has helped him cope.On his New Heights podcast, Kelce shared that he has been listening to many of Swift’s songs since the game, telling his brother Jason, “She has something for everything,” including “how the Eagles broke my heart.”Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are currently in a challenging phase in their careers, with the Super Bowl potentially causing further challenges in their relationship. “Taylor isn’t a quitter, but experiencing so much vitriol from the American public has left her feeling really shaken,” a source told Heatworld.com. “Friends and family are worried, and they’re hoping the couple can manage this darker period of their love story.”Taylor's booing at the Super Bowl caused her to feel visibly shocked and ultimately lower her morale. “Taylor has been left devastated by the boos. It was a really shocking moment – especially after she was riding so high following the Eras Tour. She sees herself as a good person who strives to make the best decisions, so to receive a public bashing was quite traumatising.”“Up until now, Taylor and Travis seemed to really complement each other’s public image, but there’s always a fear of over exposure – which is what her team think has happened,” the source continued. “It’s been a blow to them both, and it’s put pressure on them to split things up, work-wise. Travis has been criticised for not giving the team his full attention amid his high-publicity romance with Taylor. It suddenly feels like the tide is turning, and both will be advised to protect their own individual brands – at whatever cost.”A source to Page Six reports that the couple, despite initial concerns, appears to be doing well after returning from a secret vacation. “Taylor and Travis had a really nice time reconnecting after a very busy year,” the source revealed. They’re also enjoying time out of the spotlight. The source said, “Taylor and Travis have stepped out for a date night since returning to the US but went unnoticed when they did so. They weren’t photographed or anything, and enjoyed a low-key night out on the town together.”Also Read: “Enjoyed a quiet night”: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift return to the spotlight following international getaway after Chiefs' Super Bowl loss
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce are still going strong in their relationship. Following the chiefs' super bowl lix defeat, kelce has taken solace in swift's songs. The couple, despite initial concerns, appears to be doing well after returning from a secret vacation.

Article Title: “Wasted at the bar with pals”: Taylor Swift reportedly has a few non-negotiable rules for Travis Kelce to follow strictly
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Travis Kelce has three hard-and-fast rules in his relationship with Taylor Swift

Travis Kelce, the 35-year-old Kansas City Chiefs player, allegedly has three hard-and-fast rules in his relationship with Taylor Swift, also 35. The two, who started dating over the summer of 2023, are frequently spotted together and have both attained tremendous success in their careers—Swift as one of the world's largest music icons and Kelce as a vital member of the Chiefs. Even with their great push, the Chiefs failed to reach the Super Bowl following a 40-22 defeat to the Philadelphia Eagles on February 9.Kansas City Chiefs superstar Travis Kelce has three hard and fast rules when it comes to his relationship with singer Taylor Swift. Dating since summer 2023, the two are regularly spotted together and are a hot topic for fans and the media. Swift is among the world's leading musicians, and Kelce is an integral part of the Chiefs, who came up short of the Super Bowl after a 40-22 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles on February 9.According to the Life and Style Magazine, through MSN, Swift apparently has some 'rules' about how Kelce can stay in contact with her and whom the football player can socialize with during his free time.“They’ll be doing lots of texting and calling, too, but Taylor likes to see Travis in real time,” a source said. “She likes to know where he is and who he’s with. It’s not that she doesn’t trust him; she just wants to feel connected. Taylor loves Travis’ energy and spontaneity, but she doesn’t want him wasted at the bar with pals. He can celebrate his wins in style with her and their friends.”Being a high-level athlete, Travis Kelce probably does not have much of his free time spent in bars, considering the strenuous nature of his profession. Otherwise, when he is not training or on the field, he co-hosts the extremely popular New Heights podcast with his brother Jason Kelce, a retired NFL great. The podcast has attracted an enormous following and gives fans an inside look at football and the brothers' personal lives.The third rule in the relationship of Kelce and Taylor Swift is one that is most argued about. The couple has reportedly agreed to not be seen with others of the opposite gender to avoid gossip and speculation. This ruling, though questionable, is probably a move to preserve their privacy and keep away from extra reinforcement from their respective professions.“Taylor’s been in this biz long enough to know what comes with being in the spotlight,” they added.The Chiefs star recently disclosed his relationship during an appearance on the Stephen A. Smith Show. “I’m enjoying all aspects of life," said Kelce. "Me and Taylor are happy and I couldn’t be happier to enjoy that confidence off the field and all the support I could ever ask for at the stadium."He added, “I think personally, the beauty of being in a very strong relationship is that you get that support to be able to come in and focus on your craft, focus on being the best version of you. I think I’m as focused as I’ve ever been on my job and being the best player that I could possibly be week in, week out for this team."Also Read: “Enjoyed a quiet night”: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift return to the spotlight following international getaway after Chiefs' Super Bowl loss
Article Summary: Travis kelce, 35, and taylor swift, also 35, started dating over the summer of 2023. The two are regularly spotted together and are a hot topic for fans and the media. The couple has reportedly agreed to not be seen with others of the opposite gender to avoid gossip.

Article Title: “Take his ball skills and quickness”: ESPN's Mel Kiper Jr. believes Travis Hunter would best fit for the Giants
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Mel Kiper Jr. Wants the New York Giants to select Travis Hunter

The NFL Combine is now underway, with teams assessing potential prospects to shape their franchises. Heisman Trophy winner Travis Hunter is a top prospect in the draft, likely to be a top-three selection. Hunter's impressive career at Jackson State and Colorado has led the Big 12 in receptions, touchdowns, interceptions, tackles, and passes broken up.Travis Hunter, a Colorado cornerback and wide receiver, is gaining attention for his versatility in the NFL. ESPN's Mel Kiper Jr. projects him as the third overall pick, potentially joining the New York Giants, sparked by his exceptional skills."Hunter is my top-ranked prospect in the class, and though I currently see him as a receiver in the pros, he could also play cornerback for New York," Kiper wrote. "He can make a massive impact on either side of the ball, and he'll likely see at least some time on both sides.”"Perhaps the Giants take his ball skills and quickness and drop him at receiver opposite Malik Nabers to form a solid supporting cast around whomever is under center. Perhaps they look at his elite instincts and finally land a true CB1. Either way, this pick would be clutch for a struggling Giants team.”Hunter's dual capabilities could be beneficial for the Giants, as NFL analyst Sam Monson suggests he could serve as the team's top cornerback and wide receiver, complementing current standout Malik Nabers.The concept of an NFL two-way player is rare, but Hunter's talents have generated discussion among league executives and coaches. Tennessee Titans coach Brian Callahan views it as "very realistic," with the possibility of Hunter starting as a cornerback before gradually assuming offensive responsibilities.Nevertheless, there are questions regarding the physical cost and the challenge of learning both positions. In spite of these issues, Hunter's unusual combination of ability and adaptability makes him a commodity, with the potential to redefine conventional positional roles in the league.With the draft approaching, the Giants' strategy is again the subject of debate. Instability at quarterback and potential desire for veterans Matthew Stafford or Sam Darnold create space for a utility-type addition like Hunter, who could serve in various capacities.Also Read: “An exceptional talent”: Travis Hunter already winning over NFL coaches and executives as a viable two-way player In short, Travis Hunter’s rare two-way skill set makes him one of the most intriguing prospects in the upcoming NFL Draft . His ability to contribute on both defense and offense presents a unique chance for teams like the Giants to strengthen their roster and overall effectiveness.
Article Summary: Travis hunter, a colorado cornerback and wide receiver, is gaining attention for his versatility. Espn's mel kiper jr. projects him as the third overall pick, potentially joining the new york giants. The concept of an nfl two-way player is rare, but hunter's talents have generated discussion among league executives and coaches.

Article Title: “Go back home”: Carmelo Anthony sparks speculation with call for Kevin Durant to sign with Washington Wizards
Article Text:
Kevin Durant and Carmelo Anthony. Image via: Eric Gay/ AP

Carmelo Anthony advocates for Kevin Durant to bring his talents to the Washington Wizards

Kevin Durant. Image via: Cary Edmondson-Imagn Images

Carmelo Anthony has made a bold pitch for Kevin Durant to return to his roots and finish his career with the Washington Wizards . During a recent episode of his 7PM in Brooklyn podcast, the former NBA star openly advocated for Durant to leave the Phoenix Suns and bring his talent back home to D.C. It has stirred the pot of discussion among fans. Kevin Durant , who was born in Washington D.C., and raised in Maryland, has long been linked to a return home at some point in his career. While the Wizards are currently struggling with a league-worst 10-48 record, Carmelo Anthony believes that the personal satisfaction of playing in front of family in D.C. would be worth more than chasing another title."KD to the Wizards," Anthony declared. "I would like to see him in the Wizards. That's just me personally with my s---. Go back home. End it back home. You ain't gone go chase. You ain't going to go with these other teams that's out there. You've already got your rings. Go to the Wizards. Bring the energy back to D.C. You're home."Melo further shared his thoughts on the potential of the Wizards' roster, mentioning key stars like Marcus Smart, Khris Middleton, Alex Sarr, and Bub Carrington. He further argues that Durant could be the catalyst for a new era in Washington basketball.While the idea of Durant joining the Wizards might seem far-fetched given their current state, the situation in Phoenix is far from stable. The Suns, who were expected to be championship contenders this season, have been underwhelming. They entered Thursday’s slate of games with a 27-31 record, teetering on the edge of the Play-In Tournament.NBA insider Brian Windhorst recently dropped a bombshell regarding Durant’s tenure with the Suns, stating, “They’re going to trade him, and he knows that.” According to reports, Phoenix actively explored trade opportunities before the deadline, reaching out to teams like the Golden State Warriors, Miami Heat, Minnesota Timberwolves, and Memphis Grizzlies. However, Durant’s enormous contract and the difficulty of integrating a superstar midseason made a trade not quite feasible.Durant himself acknowledged the challenge of being traded midseason during an appearance on The Draymond Green Show. “A player like me, I cost a lot. Me going into your team in the middle of the season is going to be a big blow to any team I’m going to.” This suggests that if a move is coming, it’s more likely to happen in the offseason when teams have more flexibility to construct a blockbuster deal.Also Read: Why Kevin Durant Said NO: The Real Reason He Killed Potential Golden State Warriors Trade The Suns' front office is reportedly considering its long-term strategy, and trading Durant may be the only way to pivot from a failing experiment. “The only way to begin a pivot out of this team that has failed is to trade Kevin Durant,” Windhorst added.
Article Summary: Carmelo anthony advocates for kevin durant to bring his talents to the washington wizards. Nba insider brian windhorst recently dropped a bombshell regarding durant’s tenure with the suns. The suns' front office is reportedly considering its long-term strategy, and trading durant may be the only way to pivot from a failing experiment.

Article Title: Soviet chess grandmaster Boris Spassky dies at 88
Article Text:
File Pic: Boris Spassky, left and Bobby Fischer analyse their match in Sveti Stefan, Yugoslavia in 1992. (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

The Russian Chess Federation announced on Thursday that Boris Spassky , the Soviet chess grandmaster, has passed away at 88 years old. He gained global recognition for his historic 1972 match against American Bobby Fischer during the Cold War."The tenth world champion Boris Spassky has died at 88," stated the federation, describing it as a "great loss for the country."Spassky's legacy centres on the 1972 World Chess Championship against Fischer, a contest that reflected the political tensions between the United States and Soviet Union.After becoming world champion in 1969, Spassky faced significant pressure to uphold Soviet chess supremacy, which had persisted since 1948. Although he initially led the match, Fischer staged a remarkable recovery, defeating him and ending Soviet control of the world title.Following the match, Spassky revealed that losing brought unexpected relief, as it released him from what he termed a "colossal responsibility."Born in Leningrad (present-day Saint Petersburg) in 1937, Spassky displayed exceptional chess talent early, claiming the World Junior Championship and becoming the youngest grandmaster at age 18.His famous contest with Fischer has inspired numerous creative works, including books, documentaries and films. The match also influenced Walter Tevis's novel The Queen's Gambit , later adapted into a successful Netflix series in 2020.
Article Summary: Boris spassky, the soviet chess grandmaster, has passed away at 88 years old. He gained global recognition for his historic 1972 match against american bobby fischer during the cold war. His famous contest with fischer has inspired numerous creative works, including books, documentaries and films.

Article Title: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt reveals emotional turmoil after team's Super Bowl LIX loss in candid reflection
Article Text:
Credit: Instagram/Gracie Hunt

Gracie Hunt Reflects on a Memorable Month Amid Kansas City Chiefs’ Heartbreaking Super Bowl Loss



Gracie Hunt , daughter of Kansas City Chiefs ' owner and CEO Clark Hunt , recently took a moment to reflect on a whirlwind month that was filled with anticipation, excitement, and ultimately, heartbreak. Sharing her journey on Instagram on February 27, Hunt posted a heartfelt recap titled "The February Files," capturing moments from her eventful month leading up to the highly anticipated 2025 Super Bowl. Despite the Kansas City Chiefs' dreams of a historic "three-peat" being shattered by a decisive 40-22 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles , Hunt's gratitude and resilience shone through her emotional reflections.The Kansas City Chiefs entered the 2025 Super Bowl with sky-high hopes, aiming for a historic third consecutive championship. Finishing the regular season with an impressive 15-2 record, the Chiefs were poised to etch their names in NFL history. However, the Super Bowl did not unfold as planned. The Philadelphia Eagles delivered a crushing blow, leaving the Chiefs scoreless in the first half while quarterback Patrick Mahomes struggled, throwing two critical interceptions. Although the Chiefs made a valiant effort in the second half, the deficit proved insurmountable, and the Eagles secured a dominant 40-22 victory.Reflecting on all thos that happened, Hunt wrote,"feeling thankful for every moment that shapes life’s beautiful mosaic," including "the tough, the painful, the joyful, and everything in between.""Most of all, I’m grateful for the incredible people who make it all worthwhile,” she added in the caption.In the wake of this heartbreaking loss, Gracie Hunt showed remarkable grace and perspective. Reflecting on the defeat, she shared, “Praise Him when you win. Praise Him when you lose. It wasn’t the result we were hoping for, but so proud of this team’s heart and the incredible season we had.” Despite the disappointment, Hunt's words revealed her unwavering faith and gratitude for the journey. She expressed her appreciation for "every moment that shapes life’s beautiful mosaic," embracing both the highs and lows that come with the sport. Her post also conveyed her deep admiration for the Chiefs’ loyal fanbase, calling them the “best fans in the NFL” and promising that the reigning AFC champions will “be back.”Beyond the field, Gracie Hunt’s influence extends into the Kansas City Chiefs community. In an exclusive interview with PEOPLE on January 16, Hunt spoke about her passion for the team and her commitment to making a positive impact. Describing herself as the Chiefs’ “No. 1 fan,” she emphasized the importance of faith, family, football, and philanthropy in her life. Reflecting on her upbringing, she shared, "I've always been raised with the mantra that, 'To whom much is given, much is expected'."Also Read: “I owe it to my teammates”: Travis Kelce announces he’s not retiring yet, ensuring more game-day support from Taylor Swift Hunt’s involvement in the Chiefs’ organization goes beyond mere fandom. Her dedication to community service and her role in shaping the team’s culture demonstrate her commitment to something greater than herself. She highlighted the inclusive nature of the family-owned organization, saying, “When it comes to the Chiefs, there's no 'I' in 'team.' I'd say the beauty about our family organization is that there's a place for everyone.”
Article Summary: Gracie hunt is the daughter of kansas city chiefs owner and ceo clark hunt. She recently shared a heartfelt recap of her month leading up to the 2025 super bowl. Despite the chiefs' heartbreaking loss, she expressed her gratitude for the journey.

Article Title: Afghanistan Vs Australia: Champions Trophy Digest: Afghanistan face Australia with an eye on semi-finals; hosts Pakistan exit in disappointment
Article Text:
Afghanistan cricket team. (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Champions Trophy: How good is Virat Kohli in football? | Rishabh Pant recovers from viral

Pakistan's title defence ends in disappointment



Champions Trophy: Morne Morkel back as Team India practices at ICC Academy in Dubai

Afghanistan will look to continue their fairy-tale run in the Champions Trophy as they gear up for a crucial clash against Australia in Lahore on Friday, knowing that a win would secure them a historic semi-final berth. Fresh from eliminating England with a thrilling eight-run victory, Afghanistan's confidence is soaring as they prepare to face the reigning world champions.Skipper Hashmatullah Shahidi has urged his team to stay focused, emphasising that they will not burden themselves with thoughts of qualification but instead play positive cricket. "A win like this boosts confidence," said Shahidi. "We hope to beat Australia as well."Australia, meanwhile, remain well-placed for a semi-final spot after defeating England and having their game against South Africa washed out. Even if Friday's match is rained out, the Australians will progress, while Afghanistan will have to rely on net run rate or other results.Star batter Ibrahim Zadran will be key to Afghanistan's hopes after his record-breaking 177-run innings against England. The 23-year-old, returning from injury, played a pivotal role in posting 325/7, which ultimately proved just enough to send England packing. Marnus Labuschagne , speaking on Australia's preparations, acknowledged Afghanistan's growing reputation but remained confident that his side is "ready to go," despite limited outdoor training due to rain. "We'd love to win and silence the crowd," he added.While Afghanistan chase history, hosts Pakistan's campaign ended in heartbreak as their final group match against Bangladesh in Rawalpindi was washed out without a ball being bowled. Their title defence ended with a whimper, finishing last in Group A without a single win.Pakistan, who won the 2017 Champions Trophy, lost to New Zealand and India before the rain placed them at the bottom of the group points table. Captain Mohammad Rizwan admitted the team had fallen short of expectations. "We are upset and accepting that we didn't perform well," he said. "Hopefully, we will work harder and come back stronger."For Bangladesh, who also exited the tournament, captain Najmul Hossain Shanto expressed frustration at not being able to play their final match. "We really wanted to play this match, but we can't do anything about the weather," he said.India and New Zealand have already booked their semi-final spots from Group A, while South Africa, Australia and Afghanistan are vying for the remaining two spots in Group B. England have been knocked out.With Afghanistan and Australia set for a high-stakes battle in Lahore, all eyes are on whether Afghanistan can pull off another giant-killing act and cement their place in the final four.
Article Summary: Afghanistan face australia in champions trophy semi-final on friday. Hosts pakistan's campaign ends in heartbreak as final group match is washed out. India and new zealand have already booked their places in last four. South africa, australia and afghanistan are vying for remaining two spots in group b.

Article Title: “I owe it to my teammates”: Travis Kelce announces he’s not retiring yet, ensuring more game-day support from Taylor Swift
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift will be cheering Travis Kelce from the stands again next NFL season

The Athletic’s Dianna Russini Talks Rodgers, Kelce, Darnold & More with Rich Eisen | Full Interview

Taylor Swift will get to cheer on from the stands again next NFL season, as Travis Kelce has announced that he is not retiring yet. After all the rumors surrounding his league future, Kelce settled it with a text message that was read out on The Pat McAfee Show during Thursday's show. Host Pat McAfee posted Kelce's reply, saying the Chiefs' tight end is "coming back for sure," so fans can look forward to more of Swift's trademark game-day visits.Taylor Swift will be cheering from the stands again next NFL season, as Travis Kelce has assured that he is not retiring yet. Following much speculation regarding his league future, Kelce put an end to rumors with a text message read on The Pat McAfee Show during Thursday's show. Host Pat McAfee read Kelce's reply, indicating the Chiefs' tight end is "coming back for sure," meaning fans can look forward to more of Swift's signature game-day visits."Gonna try and get to the best shape I've been this offseason and get back to the mountaintop," McAfee read from Kelce's message. "Got a real bad taste in my mouth with how I played in that last game and how I got the guys ready for battle. I can’t go out like that!!!!”Kelce addressed rumors about the Kansas City Chiefs ' loss at Super Bowl LIX on his "New Heights" podcast, but did not provide a final verdict. "I know everybody wants to know whether or not I'm playing next year, and right now, I'm just kicking everything down the road. I'm not making any crazy decisions. I'm gonna take some time to figure it out," he said at the time.He further added, "And, I think I owe it to my teammates that if I do come back, it's a wholehearted decision. I'm not half-assing it, and I'm fully here for them.”Kelce inked a two-year deal last season, with speculation suggesting he would receive an $11.5 million bonus should he agree to play in the 2025 season by March 14. Kansas City Chiefs General Manager Brett Veach has since clarified there was no such deadline for Kelce's announcement. In spite of continued rumblings regarding Kelce's NFL future, the Chiefs seem to be allowing their franchise tight end the leeway to make a decision on his own terms.“How we left it at the end of the season is that he was fired up,” he said during an episode of The Rich Eisen Show. “He has one more year under contract. I still think he has that fire and desire to play.” He added, "As far as I’m concerned, there is no deadline,” he said. “I think we left it as he’d be back, and we’re excited to get him back and get him going.”Jason Kelce, Travis’s older brother and co-host of their podcast, shared his thoughts on Travis’s upcoming decision during a previous appearance on The Steam Room. Having retired from the NFL himself last year, Jason weighed in on the uncertainty surrounding his brother’s future in the league. “I think Travis, I think he probably, in his heart, already knows what he wants to do," Jason had said. "That’s the reality of it.”Also Read: “He's getting hair transplant”: Fans react to Travis Kelce's change in appearance, speculates Taylor Swift is behind it Travis Kelce has made it clear that he is not retiring from the NFL anytime soon. Despite ongoing speculation, the Kansas City Chiefs’ star tight end has confirmed his plans to continue playing. His decision means fans can expect to see him back on the field next season, with Taylor Swift likely showing her support from the stands once again.
Article Summary: Taylor swift will be cheering from the stands again next nfl season. Travis kelce has assured that he is not retiring yet. The kansas city chiefs’ star tight end has confirmed his plans to continue playing. His decision means fans can expect to see him back on the field next season.

Article Title: Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry’s New 3-Point Record Leaves Damian Lillard and Klay Thompson in the Dust
Article Text:
Credits: NBA

Is Golden State Warriors Stephen Curry’s 3-Point Record the Most Unbreakable Stat in NBA History?

In the realm of NBA three-point shooting, there's Stephen Curry , and then there's everyone else. It's like comparing a supernova to a sparkler. While Damian Lillard and Klay Thompson are certified sharpshooters, Curry's recent exploits are less a demonstration of skill and more a display of basketball sorcery. Take the Golden State Warriors ' recent East Coast swing opener against the Orlando Magic. Even when the Dubs faced a daunting early deficit, Curry, simply rewrote the script.He started slow, almost toying with the Magic, before unleashing a second-quarter inferno. It was almost four minutes into the first quarter before the two-time MVP made his first shot. He scored the opening points of the game for the Warriors after draining a 28-footer. Orlando surged to a 34-23 lead as Curry closed the quarter with five points and two assists. Steph Curry scored 16 points in the second quarter, including the final three-pointer, a 49-footer, which reduced the Magic's lead to 66-52.When you see "Most games with 9+ 3-pointers made in NBA history," it reads:45 — Steph Curry14 — Damian Lillard12 — Klay ThompsonYou don't just see a number, you witness a chasm. A canyon. A continental divide.Lillard and Thompson, two titans of the long ball, are relegated to the 'also-rans' section of the Curry story. It's not a slight on their abilities, but a testament to Curry's otherworldly consistency. They're like elite chefs forced to watch a culinary demigod effortlessly whip up a five-star meal while blindfolded. Imagine trying to explain to a casual fan that someone has more than three times the number of elite shooting performances than their closest competitors. It's like explaining quantum physics with interpretive dance.ALSO READ: Why Kevin Durant Said NO: The Real Reason He Killed Potential Golden State Warriors Trade Curry's dominance isn't just about making shots; it's about altering the very fabric of the game. He's redefined what's possible, forcing defenses to stretch to absurd lengths, and inspiring a generation of kids to launch shots from the logo. So, while Lillard and Thompson continue to light up scoreboards, Curry's legacy is etched in a different stratosphere, a place where gravity bends and three-pointers fall like rain.
Article Summary: Stephen curry has more games with 9+ 3-pointers made in nba history than damian lillard and klay thompson. Curry's dominance isn't just about making shots; it's about altering the very fabric of the game. He's redefined what's possible, forcing defenses to stretch to absurd lengths.

Article Title: Will Paolo Banchero play tonight against the Golden State Warriors? Latest update on the Orlando Magic star's injury report (February 27, 2025)
Article Text:
Orlando Magic forward Paolo Banchero (5) goes up to shoot in front of Detroit Pistons forward Ronald Holland II (00) during the second half of an NBA basketball game, Saturday, Jan. 25, 2025, in Orlando, Fla. (Image via AP Photo/Phelan M. Ebenhack)

Is Paolo Banchero playing tonight? Orlando Magic’s injury report for tonight’s game against the Golden State Warriors (February 27, 2025)

Golden State Warriors injury report for tonight’s game against the Orlando Magic (February 27, 2025)

When and where to watch the Orlando Magic play tonight (February 27, 2025)?

The Orlando Magic (29-31) are gearing up for a crucial matchup against the Golden State Warriors (31-27) on Thursday, February 27, at the Kia Center in Orlando. However, all eyes are on Paolo Banchero, the Magic’s standout forward, whose injury status remains a key concern for the team. Paolo Banchero is playing tonight against the Golden State Warriors. Banchero, who has been a consistent force for Orlando, averaging 21 points, 6.6 rebounds, and 4.8 assists over the last 20 games, is not listed on the team’s official injury report. This is a positive sign for the Magic, as they look to capitalize on his all-around contributions against a Warriors squad missing key players.The Magic, however, are not without their injury woes. Moritz Wagner is out for the season with a knee injury, while Jalen Suggs remains sidelined with a quadriceps issue. Cole Anthony, a vital piece off the bench, is questionable due to a knee problem. These absences could put additional pressure on Banchero and Franz Wagner, who leads the team with 24.9 points per game, to step up.On the Warriors’ side, Jonathan Kuminga is out with an ankle injury, and Trayce Jackson-Davis is questionable due to illness. Despite these setbacks, Golden State boasts a strong lineup led by Stephen Curry, who averages 23.3 points and ranks first in the league with 4.3 made three-pointers per game.The Magic, currently ranked 30th in the league with 103.9 points per game, will need Paolo Banchero at his best to overcome the Warriors’ eighth-ranked defense, which allows just 111.1 points per contest. Orlando’s ability to control the boards, led by Goga Bitadze’s 7.8 rebounds per game, will also be critical in this matchup.As the game approaches, fans are hopeful Paolo Banchero remains healthy and ready to lead the Magic in what promises to be a competitive showdown. Tip-off is set for 7:00 PM ET, with live coverage available on NBCS-BA, FDSFL, and Fubo.Also read: Will Stephen Curry play tonight against the Orlando Magic? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors star's injury report (February 27, 2025) For now, the Magic can breathe a sigh of relief as their star forward appears to be in good shape. But with key players sidelined, the team will need a collective effort to secure a win against the Warriors.
Article Summary: The orlando magic (29-31) are gearing up for a crucial matchup against the golden state warriors (31-27) on thursday, february 27, at the kia center in orlando. Paolo banchero is not listed on the team’s official injury report. The magic, however, are not without their injury woes.

Article Title: What Will John Cena Do After Leaving the WWE? Exploring Career Paths For The Champ
Article Text:
Image Via Getty Images

John Cena’s WWE retirement tour

John Cena lays out plans for Farewell Tour: Raw on Netflix Post-Show highlights, Jan. 6, 2025

The career path ahead for John Cena

John Cena On The Rock, WWE GOAT, Fake Lamborghini, NFL Dream, Jackpot!, Eminem & Last Year In WWE

Also Read:

John Cena is one of the marquee WWE superstars of all time who has been associated with the company for more than two decades. He has garnered much fame in the world of entertainment wrestling and significantly gained prominence in Hollywood too, apart from the WWE ring.After having a successful 25-year career in WWE, the superstar is set to begin his Retirement Tour in 2025. According to WWE, Cena will be available for the whole of 2025 in his farewell tour and will be a part of several foreign tours and big PLEs.As the road to WrestleMania leads through Europe, reports suggest that John Cena will be part of this journey. On Monday, WWE’s social media page in the UK revealed that John Cena is coming to Brussels, Glasgow, and London in March for WWE RAW.However, after the Cenation leader bids his final goodbye to the ring, fans are speculating what will be the next step for the WWE champ. Let’s find out the road ahead for the wrestling superstar–Following RAW’s debut on Netflix in January, John Cena revealed that his 2025 retirement tour included 36 dates and an unknown number of matches. With his recent Royal Rumble performance, upcoming participation in the Elimination Chamber match, and three European dates, Cena has approximately 30 appearances remaining on his current deal.As per reports, Cena will open his RAW European set in Brussels on March 17, 2025. The following week, he will be in Glasgow on March 24, 2025, before heading to London on March 31, 2025.Speculations suggest that he could wrestle on one or all three of RAW’s upcoming overseas shows, which speaks about Cena’s farewell will be nothing but full of promotional work for his final matches at events like WrestleMania 41, marking the end of an era.The road ahead for John Cena seems interesting as the wrestler has plans to juggle his career between wrestling and acting. In an interview with ‘Club Shay Shay Podcast’, Cena revealed his plans with WWE and his wish to stay connected to the company even after retirement.He stated: “I have such a trustworthy relationship with them, over two decades. I am a champion of the brand. I love the company, it is my home, they are my family. Even after 2025, I have already signed an extension to remain a member of the WWE family for the near, mid, and long-term future.”“I don't think there will be a beat of my heart where WWE doesn't come out of,” said Cena in the podcast about his potential association with WWE, after his retirement in 2025.Over the years, the Cenation leader has not only carved his name into glory in the world of entertainment wrestling but is a famous acting and TV personality in Hollywood too. Besides wrestling, John Cena has also tried his hands at acting too. He has appeared in popular Hollywood movies like Fast 9, Bumblebee, and Ricky Stanicky.As per reports, after leaving WWE John Cena will continue acting and pursue other projects, including his DC Comics show Peacemaker . The show, as well as Cena, had a pretty great season one to start the story of the anti-hero, and now the director James Gunn says that he is ready for season 2 of Peacemaker.Speaking in a press event, the director of Peacemaker season 2, James Gunn said: “Peacemaker is all done. I am deep in editing with that at the same time I’m doing Superman. It’s been really fun.” He further added about Cena and how he has improved so far in terms of acting and what he brings to the table.Gunn stated: “I think he surprised people a lot in the first season with what he was able to do performance-wise. And the guy grew exponentially in season two. And he’s really incredible, as is the whole cast.”Cena is an extraordinarily talented human being, who loves juggling between acting and wrestling. The wrestling superstar is currently busy with the greatest adventure of his wrestling career in 2025, but there is a potential career path waiting for him ahead.
Article Summary: Wwe superstar john cena is set to begin his retirement tour in 2025. Cena will be available for the whole of 2025 in his farewell tour and will be a part of several foreign tours and big ples. As per reports, after leaving wwe john cena will continue acting and pursue other projects, including his dc comics show peacemaker.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby’s reaction to Pittsburgh Penguins' poor performance comes to light amid recent loss to Flyers
Article Text:
Image via AP Photo/Seth Wenig, File

Sidney Crosby Is Not Happy With The Way The Pittsburgh Penguins Have Been Performing



Sidney Crosby led Team Canda to win at the 4 Nations Face Off’s final match against Team USA last week, but his NHL team, the Pittsburgh Penguins , has been failing at the games. After their recent loss against the Washington Capitals, fans have not been very kind to the team. But now, recently, there has been some insight into what the captain of the team, Sidney Crosby, feels about the whole situation regarding the Pittsburgh Penguins.As per the Pittsburgh Penguins’ reporter, Michelle Crechiolo’s post on X, it seems like Sidney Crosby is not too thrilled about the situation with his team. The post also spoke about how Sidney Crosby spoke to Bryan Rust about the situation, and they are not happy.Pittsburgh Penguins’ reporter Michelle Crechiolo also revealed that the star players dont want to waste their time in “moping around and scowling”.At this point in time, the situation of the Pittsburgh Penguins is pretty sensitive as fans believe the team has pretty low chances of making it to the NHL playoffs this season. The team lost to the Philadelphia Flyers recently at 6-1, and fans are pretty disappointed with the way the team has been playing.Many fans of the Pittsburgh Penguins also believe that the focus of the team is not on winning anymore but on other things. Recently, the team posted a funny video on X featuring Michael Bunting and Bryan Rust but fans are not happy with it.A fan commented, “Last place, lost the last 2 games 14-4...Let the Beer League jokes begin. Maybe a little tone deaf?”, while another fan wrote, “So glad we are focused on not winning hockey games”.A third fan made a sarcastic comment that read as, “glad we have our priorities straight”.Sidney Crosby has not issued a statement yet about the poor performance of the team. The star player also did not take any time off for rest after he came back from winning the 4 Nations Face Off.The Pittsburgh Penguins will be playing against the Philadelphia Flyers again tonight.Also Read: "Most disappointing player": Auston Matthews slammed for "poor" performance amid playoff doubts
Article Summary: Sidney crosby led team canda to win at the 4 nations face off’s final match against team usa last week. But his nhl team, the pittsburgh penguins, has been failing at the games. The team lost to the philadelphia flyers recently at 6-1, and fans are pretty disappointed with the way the team has been playing.

Article Title: Shaquille O’Neal gave Damon Wayans a Lakers ring as a reward for a surprising reason: “It’s that special”
Article Text:
Shaquille O’Neal and Damon Wayans. Image via: Paras Griffin/ Getty | Getty Images

Shaquille O’Neal and

Shaquille O’Neal gifted Damon Wayans a championship ring for roasting his free throws



Image via: Rich Fury/Getty Images

Damon Wayans Leaves Shaq In TEARS, Reacts To Luka’s Huge Game & Hilarious BPS vs WPS

Basketball and Hollywood have often crossed paths, but few friendships in the sports and entertainment world are as unique as the one between Damon Wayans . The legendary comedian was recently a guest on The Big Podcast with Shaq , where he revealed that O’Neal had given him one of his prized championship rings for relentlessly mocking his missed free throws. Damon Wayans has been a comic powerhouse, and his legacy is continued with his son’s charismatic prowess in the field of entertainment. NBA Hall of Famer Shaquille O’Neal has been a close friend of Wayans Sr. and appeared as a guest in the recent episode of The Big Podcast with Shaq. They discussed about the ring that Shaq gave Wayans for taunting him after the former Lakers legend missed three free throws.“I got a beautiful three-peat ring,” Wayans said. “I’ve never worn it, it’s that special,” he added.This unexpected gift wasn’t just a random gesture— it was Shaq’s way of showing appreciation for Wayans’ courtside antics, which kept him entertained during his time with the Los Angeles Lakers.“As a professional athlete, it’s our job to entertain. So, I can remember going to the game and being like ‘Oh s**t, that’s Damon Wayans’, ‘Oh s**t, that’s Eddie Murphy’, ‘Oh s**t, that’s Tom Cruise’. I wanted to give them the joy that they gave me,” Shaq said.Shaq’s struggles at the free-throw line were certainly hilarious for Wayans. He was a regular at Lakers games and wasn’t shy about heckling O’Neal every time he missed a shot. “Damon was always there. And when I missed free throws, he’d give it to me…” the NBA Hall of Famer continued, adding, “So, whenever I would win, I would find out where my favorite people lived at, and I would just send them that as a token of my appreciation.”Instead of taking offense, Shaq found joy in the playful ribbing. In fact, he credits Wayans and his legendary comedic family for being a source of relief during the intense grind of an NBA season.O’Neal explained that, as a professional athlete, it was his job to entertain, just as actors and comedians do in Hollywood. Growing up watching stars like Wayans, Eddie Murphy, and Tom Cruise, he felt a deep respect for the people who brought him joy. Gifting memorabilia, including his championship rings, was his way of giving back.Beyond the courtside jokes, Shaq has maintained a close relationship with the entire Wayans family , crediting them with helping him escape the pressures of his basketball career.“The Wayans family was at the apex of making me laugh,” O’Neal said, explaining how their comedic genius provided much-needed distractions from the rigors of life in the NBA.Also Read: Shaq Wants Luka Doncic to Be Pettier: Is He Holding Back Against the Mavericks? Wayans has been a well-known celebrity in Hollywood as a stand-up comedian, actor, producer, and writer. He and his son Damon Wayans Jr. appeared in the recent CBS sitcom Poppa's House. Additionally, he has Lethal Weapon, Major Payne, My Wife and Kids, The Last Boy Scout, and several other movies and shows to his credit.
Article Summary: Shaquille o’neal gifted damon wayans a championship ring for roasting his free throws. Shaq credits wayans and his comedic family for being a source of relief during the intense grind of an nba season. Wayans has been a well-known celebrity in hollywood as a stand-up comedian, actor, producer, and writer.

Article Title: Former WWE Star Dave Bautista Announced as a Presenter Alongside Other Hollywood Big Shots for the Academy Awards 2025
Article Text:
Dave Bautista via Getty Images

Dune: Part Two The Academy releases the names of the next batch of Oscar presenters Wicked Dave Bautista urges fans to help with Gears of War movie Gears of War Dave Bautista Wants Gears of War Movie! #gearsofwar #davebautista #gearsofwars Gears of War The 97th Academy Awards are right around the corner, to be held at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Los Angeles on March 2. The next batch of presenters for the 2025 Oscars night was just released, and actor and former WWE star Dave Bautista has been named as one alongside other Hollywood bigshots. Bautista was part of the Oscar-nominated movieand will be a presenter at the ceremony this year.Earlier today, the Academy released a list of names who will be joining the Oscars this year as presenters. We already knew Joe Alwyn, Halle Berry, Sterling K. Brown, Penélope Cruz, Willem Dafoe, Ana de Armas, Lily-Rose Depp, Robert Downey Jr., Elle Fanning, Whoopi Goldberg, Selena Gomez, Goldie Hawn, Scarlett Johansson, John Lithgow, Cillian Murphy, Connie Nielsen, Amy Poehler, Da’Vine Joy Randolph, June Squibb, Ben Stiller, Emma Stone, Oprah Winfrey and Bowen Yang would be presenting this year.Now the next batch includes former WWE star Dave Bautista and other stars like Gal Gadot, Andrew Garfield, Margaret Qualley, Alba Rohrwacher, Harrison Ford, Zoe Saldaña, Samuel L. Jackson, and Rachel Zegler. The show will be aired live in more than 200 countries, with an opening performance byco-stars Ariana Grande and Cynthia Erivo. The show is being hosted by comedian Conan O'Brian this year.The newly named Oscar presenter has been making a name for himself in the world of acting, deemed by many as the best wrestling talent to have joined Hollywood. And he is ready to star in Netflix'smovie, even if Netflix hasn't formally announced any cast list yet. But looks like Bautista doesn't like the waiting game, and is ready to take matters into his own hands."Start an online thing about freaking Gears of War. Come on, Netflix. Come on already. It’s not like I’m not badgering them. Come on, Netflix. Get it together."Dave Bautista is urging fans to start a campaign and get him cast in themovie by Netflix. He is a popular choice among fans to play the role of the protagonist, Marcus Fenix, of the Coalition of Ordered Governments. Even the creator of the game, on which the movie is being based, Cliff Bleszinski, also wants The Animal to play the lead protagonist. Let's See if Netflix listens to everyone's pleas on this one.Also Read: Is The Rock the True Hollywood King? or Is Dave Bautista Stealing the Spotlight? Find out!
Article Summary: Dave bautista urges fans to help with gears of war movie. The actor and former wwe star has been named as one of the next batch of oscar presenters. The 97th academy awards will be held at the dolby theatre in hollywood, los angeles on march 2.

Article Title: “He takes too much criticism”: Oilers general manager defended Evan Bouchard from harsh criticism, arguing that much of it is unfair
Article Text:
Image vi aImagn Images

Stan Bowman defended defenseman Evan Bouchard from criticism



Evan Bouchard , the Edmonton Oilers ' top defenceman, has been under scrutiny for several glaring defensive mistakes , including a failed play on Brandon Hagel's wraparound goal. Despite criticism of his lack of urgency and adaisical play, Oilers general manager Stan Bowman has defended Bouchard's criticism, speaking out on Wednesday's episode of Frankly Speaking with Frank Seravalli.Edmonton Oilers general manager Stan Bowman defended defenseman Evan Bouchard from criticism from fans and analysts, arguing that much of it is unfair. Bowman acknowledged the criticism but defended his player, suggesting that Bouchard's mistakes might be magnified due to the spotlight he receives. Many have pointed fingers at Bouchard for his turnovers and defensive mistakes this season.'“Bouch does get a lot of criticism — I think a lot unfairly so,” said Bowman. “He’s a great player, he really is a big part of our team. He’s very effective, and I think sometimes when… your mistakes get spotlighted, for whatever reason, then maybe there’s more attention given to it.“But he’s played well. He’s very good at complimenting our best players. That’s an important role when you got really creative offensive players who are forwards, you need to have someone who can help them score.”Bouchard has been instrumental in helping the Oilers' top players generate offense, with 60% of his ice time spent with Connor McDavid . This has increased the team's shot attempt share, expected goal share, and scoring chance share by about four percent. McDavid's goal share is 36.11 percent away from Bouchard, but when they're together, it rises to 58.33 percent. However, Bowman noted a slow start to the season for both Bouchard and the team.“He started slow, like a lot of our guys didn’t start great in October, and whether that was residual from playing a long time last year or getting going when you know how long the season is and you know the grind it is, I don’t know,” said Bowman. “But I think once really from November on, Bouch has done a good job for us. He’s an important player and I think sometimes he takes too much criticism.”Also Read: “Detroit is cooking”: The Detroit Red Wings fans are fueling their excitement over the recent NHL trade, saving $3.5 billion Bouchard, despite some mistakes this season, remains one of the top blue-liners in the game. His ability to drive offence is second to none, helping the Oilers generate 59.4 expected goals, the most of any defencemen in the league. He has a +12 goal-to-goal ratio at five-on-five.
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers general manager stan bowman defended defenseman evan bouchard from criticism from fans and analysts. Bowman acknowledged the criticism but defended his player, suggesting that bouchar's mistakes might be magnified due to the spotlight he receives. Despite some mistakes this season, remains one of the top blue-liners in the game.
